.. _`bcftools index`:

BCFTOOLS INDEX
==============

Index vcf/bcf file.





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule bcftools_index:
        input:
            "a.bcf"
        output:
            "a.bcf.csi"
        params:
            extra=""  # optional parameters for bcftools index
        wrapper:
            "0.66.0-225-gb77af9ed/bio/bcftools/index"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.
